name: AzureDevTestLabsCreateEnvironment
description: Create an Azure DevTest Labs Environment
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running.

inputs.name: LabId
inputs.label: Lab Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of an existing lab in which the lab VM will be created. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting an **Azure RM Subscription**.

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the environment to create.

inputs.name: ParameterFile
inputs.label: Parameter File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path or URL of the ARM template parameters file to use. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: ParameterOverrides
inputs.label: Parameter Overrides
inputs.helpMarkDown: ARM template parameters to use. You can use any variable such as `$(Build.BuildNumber)` or `$(Release.ReleaseName)` when in a build or a release, respectively, for the `newVMName`. Similarly, you can create variables such as `User.Name` and `User.Password`, where the latter is marked as a _secret_.

inputs.name: OutputEnvironmentResourceId
inputs.label: Lab Environment ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable to capture the created lab environment ID. Default is `lab.EnvironmentResourceId`. The variable can be referred as `$(lab.EnvironmentResourceId)` in subsequent tasks. You can use a name other than the default.

inputs.name: OutputEnvironmentResourceGroupId
inputs.label: Lab Environment Resource Group ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable to capture the created lab environment ID. Default is `lab.EnvironmentResourceGroupId`. The variable can be referred as `$(lab.EnvironmentResourceGroupId)` in subsequent tasks. You can use a name other than the default.

inputs.name: TemplateOutputImport
inputs.label: Use environment template output as build/release variables

inputs.name: TemplateOutputPrefix
inputs.label: Add a prefix for build/release variables imported from the template output.
